description: Camp Chaos is a provocative meditation and exploration of Matthew Camp’s formative sexual memories.   Taking the form of a hybrid documentary / experimental film / art project, it uses explicit sex to blend reality and fantasy in a way that creates what feels like a true and authentic portrayal of a man's innermost sexual landscape. A time capsule of what gay relationships and encounters are like in a post-online dating and social media world, Camp Chaos is a timely and erotic document of the way millennials treat and understand the sex they've had, are having and will have. In this episode Matthew remembers a steamy encounter in Hawaii, recollecting the particular tricks and techniques of a former lover that drove him wild. He remembers the rolling surf, the smell of sunscreen and his lover's soft feet, the only ingredient he's missing is the perfect guy to help him recreate the memory. After a thorough interview process, Matthew finds the charmingly scruffy and disarmingly sweet Levi Wolfe. The two have an instant tender chemistry, sharing an intimate moment grooming their beards and playfully discussing their sexual history before coming together on the bed for an intense, psychedelic encounter.
title: Camp Chaos - Kauai: Bareback
